list: I'm a software engineer with over 13 years of experience programming working in the video game industry, the VFX world, the financial sector and the hospitality industry.
I love my work. Ask me to do anything and I'll figure out how to do it.
Languages: Python, C#, Ruby, Go, Typescript, Javascript, C++
CI: Github Actions, Jenkins, Buddy, CircleCI

list.title: Senior Software Engineer @ Sonder
list: Developed dynamic pricing system in Python to price inventory based on supply/demand.
Developed 3rd party distribution system in Ruby to sync inventory on Airbnb, Booking.com, Expedia, etc.
Maintained gigantic legacy Ruby on Rails codebase.

list.title: Software Engineer @ Morgan Stanley
list: Developed system in Python to aggregate data from in-house and vendor sources, analyze and present it to devs (badges to encourage best practices) and to management (metrics/charts to guide decision-making).
Developed self-service web apps in Typescript/Angular2 (querying agile/devops metrics, JIRA admin).

list.title: Programmer @ Framestore VR
list: Built an art asset pipeline for UE4, writing plugins in C++ and Python code to glue everything together.

list.title: Programmer @ Borealys Games
list: Developed UI and various gameplay systems in Unity (C#) on Mages of Mystralia.
Caves of Qud game mods coded in C# through reverse engineering / patching.
Tampermonkey scripts to link bookoutlet.ca with goodsreads.com to improve the browsing experience.

list.title: Interactive Real Time Systems Development @ University of Sherbrooke
